title: The Public Passenger Transport (Kingston Metropolitan Transport Region
title_en: The Public Passenger Transport (Kingston Metropolitan Transport Region
short_name: Public Passenger Transport (Kingston Metropolitan Transport Region

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Order may be cited as the Public Passenger Transport (Kingston
Metropolitan Transport Region) Order, 2002.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. Regulation 26 of the Road Traflic Regulations 1938 shall apply in
relation to the services provided under or by virtue of any exclusive licence
granted under section 3 of the Act or the vehicles from time to time
used for the purposes of any of those services with the following
modification:
The substitution of the words "Form A of the Schedule to the Public
Passenger Transport (angston Metropolitan Transport Region) Order, 2002"
for the words "Form B1 of the Schedule".
                                   SCHEDULE                                     (Paragraph 2)
